translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The reverse order of the law of conditionality, the text of the Paṭṭhāna according to the method of the Triads

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽22.16. Kusalattika, Saraṇaduka🔽Nakusalaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā akusalo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nakusalaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ🔽naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ naaraṇañca
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  kusalattika saraṇaduka  na kusalam na saraṇam dhammam paccayā akusalaḥ saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na kusalam na araṇam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na abyākata  na araṇam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ araṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalam na araṇam ca
translated: The triad of the wholesome, the dyad of the refuge

original: naabyākataṁ naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽(Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na abyākatam na araṇañca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā 🔽saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
